mapper.select: SELECT b.branch_id, b.branch_name, oi.parts_id, p.part_name, oi.order_item_quantity, oi.order_item_price, o.order_date, o.order_status, oi.order_id FROM order_item oi JOIN parts p ON oi.parts_id = p.part_id JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN branch b ON o.branch_id = b.branch_id WHERE o.order_status IN ('승인 대기');
SELECT b.branch_id, b.branch_name, p.part_id, p.part_name FROM branch b CROSS JOIN parts p
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, p.part_name, o.order_deny FROM order_item oi JOIN parts p ON oi.parts_id = p.part_id JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.order_deny IN ('결제', '반려');

SELECT b.branch_id, oi.parts_id, p.part_name, oi.order_item_quantity, oi.order_item_price, o.order_date, o.order_status FROM order_item oi JOIN parts p ON oi.parts_id = p.part_id JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN branch b ON o.branch_id = b.branch_id WHERE o.order_status IN ('승인 대기');
